title: Kemer Cup
text: The Kemer Cup was a tournament for professional female <a href="tennis">tennis</a> players played on indoor <a href="hard%20court">hard court</a>s. The event was classified as a $50,000 <a href="ITF%20Women%27s%20Circuit">ITF Women's Circuit</a> tournament and was held in <a href="Istanbul">Istanbul</a>, Turkey, in 2013.
